text_1: Computer systems analysts study an organization’s current computer systems and design ways to improve efficiency.
text_2: The median annual wage for computer systems analysts was $99,270 in May 2021.
text_4: Computer systems analysts typically need a bachelor’s degree to enter the occupation. Studying a computer science or information systems field is common, although not always a requirement. Some firms hire job candidates who have a degree in business or liberal arts along with relevant skills.
